Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillcrest Drive, east of the large intersection.
Room.LongDescription: A large intersection to the west joing Hillcrest Drive, Eidenhoft Boulevard and Marina Way. The small sliver of land formed by Eidenhoft Boulevard as it runs off to the northeast is owned by the Odgen Family and is used to display their famous statues for the public's admiration. On the south, you can see the large Regalia Convent. The entrance to the Convent is located off of Marina Way.
